data.title: Ilovik climate: Average Temperature by month, Ilovik water temperature
data.text:
average temperature by month Ilovik

The month of maximum warmth in a year is August. The average temperature during this period reaches up to 23.7 °C | 74.6 °F, making it the hottest time of the year. The lowest average temperatures in the year occur in February, when it is around 7.4 °C | 45.3 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Ilovik

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The variation in precipitation between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 137 mm | 5 inch, as observed. The variation in temperatures throughout the year is 16.3 °C | 29.4 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is May (74.08 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is December (68.75 percent). The month with the most rainy days is November (13.50 days). The month with the fewest rainy days is July (4.23 days).

Hours of sunshine in Ilovik

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Ilovik, the month that is graced with the most daily hours of sunshine is June. This month sees an average of 13.33 hours of sunshine. In total, there are 413.11 hours of sunshine throughout June.

In Ilovik, the month that experiences the lowest number of daily sunshine hours is January. The average duration of sunlight during this period amounts to approximately 5.78 hours per day, resulting in a total sum of 179.06 sunshine hours throughout the entire month.

In Ilovik, the sun shines for an average of 3492.09 hours per year. That comes out to 114.66 hours of sunshine each month.

The water temperature in Ilovik (Adriatic Sea) is on an annual average at about 17.80°C | 64.04°F.

In July, the highest water temperature is reached with a monthly average of 24.90°C | 76.82°F. Whereas in February the lowest average water temperatures are expected with about 11.40°C | 52.52°F.

The lowest water temperatures are seen around the year around February 28 at 11.40°C | 52.52°F. The average highest water temperatures are around 24.90°C | 76.82°F and are measured around July 22.

The nearest water to Ilovik is Adriatic Sea.
